basics.name: Jorge Infante
basics.label: Web Developer | Software Developer | Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary:
Hi! I'm Jorge, a computer engineering student at UAM Cuajimalpa 💻

While I'm studying, I am taking courses that promote my professional growth that address various technologies and relevant aspects in my area, as well as perfecting my English skills.

I consider myself a fairly persevering and constant person in my own goals. I enjoy working and improving day by day in all the aspects of my life, whether on a personal, work or educational level. I adapt well to changes and I am good at working as a team. 👦🏻

Learn more about me in my profile! 👇🏻

work.summary: Systems Engineering intern at Grupo Presidente, involved in IT process optimization, technical training, and cross-team collaboration to enhance infrastructure and workflow efficiency.
work.name: Grupo Presidente
highlights: Delivered 10+ technical training sessions on AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini) to IT staff, improving understanding of automation and digital solutions
Led evaluation and implementation of Jira for project tracking, enhancing task visibility across multiple departments
Collaborated with infrastructure and development teams using Agile methodologies to document databases and streamline internal processes
Supported IT operations by identifying areas for automation and process improvement
Assisted in integrating internal tools to optimize reporting and workflow efficiency

awards.title: Programming Contest
awards.summary: For achieving 1st place in the Programming Contest. At the 13th Week of Computing and Applied Mathematics (SCMA'24) held in Mexico City, from August 5 to 9, 2024.

awards.title: Oral Presentation
awards.summary: For achieving 3rd place in the Oral Presentation category with their work 'Network Reporting.' At the 13th Week of Computing and Applied Mathematics (SCMA'24) held in Mexico City, from August 5 to 9, 2024.

projects.name: Network Reporting
projects.summary: A Python-based network automation tool that generates reports of a network topology automatically using Cisco's Restconf protocol.

projects.name: FusionStyleHub
projects.summary: A web application built with React and Firebase, combining interactive front-end features with cloud backend services.

projects.name: Vaqueros
projects.summary: An e-commerce website developed for a friend's business selling hats, focusing on user-friendly interface and online sales functionality.

projects.name: GYM BIBLE
projects.summary: A web platform providing nutritional and fitness information tailored to gym enthusiasts, with engaging and easy-to-navigate content.
